title: Lo! He comes; th' Archangel's trumpet

verses.text: Lo! He comes; th' Archangel's trumpet Wakes to life the slumbering dead; Mid ten thousand thousand angels, See their great exalted Head! Hallelujah! Welcome, welcome, Son of God.
Hail the earth-awakening morning! Saints behold the Judge appear; Truth and justice go before him; Now the joyful sentence hear: Hallelujah! Welcome, welcome, Judge divine.
Come, ye blessed of my Father, Enter into life and joy; Banish all your fears and sorrows; Endless praise to your employ! Hallelujah! Welcome to your great reward.
